# ui-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                              | Type                                                                | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaDescribedby` | `aria-describedby` | ARIA described by for additional context | `string`                                                            | `undefined` |
| `ariaLabel`       | `aria-label`       | ARIA label for accessibility             | `string`                                                            | `undefined` |
| `disabled`        | `disabled`         | Disabled state                           | `boolean`                                                           | `false`     |
| `loading`         | `loading`          | Loading state                            | `boolean`                                                           | `false`     |
| `size`            | `size`             | Button size                              | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                              | `'md'`      |
| `type`            | `type`             | Button type                              | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                   | `'button'`  |
| `variant`         | `variant`          | Button variant style                     | `"destructive" \| "ghost" \| "outline" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |
